name: Expense sent
subject: Expense submission by $Expense.user.name$
content:
Hello,


An expense has been submitted to you by $Expense.user.name$.

Please log in to consult it.

You may reject or validate it.


Best regards
metaModel.name: Expense

name: Expense refused
subject: Expense rejection
content:
Hello,


Your expense $Expense.fullName$ is unfortunately not congruent and can not be validated as is.

Please log in to consult it.

In order to know the missing information for this expense to be validated, please reply to this e-mail.


Best regards


$Expense.refusedBy.name$
metaModel.name: Expense

name: Expense validated
subject: Expense validation
content:
Hello,


Your expense ($Expense.user.name$) has been validated and will be payed as soon as possible.

Please log in to consult it.


Best regards


$Expense.validatedBy.name$
metaModel.name: Expense

name: Leave request sent
subject: Leave request of ($LeaveRequest.user.name$)
content:
Hello $LeaveRequest.user.employee.managerUser.name$,


$LeaveRequest.user.name$ informs you of a leave request from $LeaveRequest.fromDate; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ to $LeaveRequest.toDate; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ on $LeaveRequest.leaveReason.leaveReason$ ($LeaveRequest.duration$ day(s)).

Please log in to consult it.

You may reject or validate it.


Best regards
metaModel.name: LeaveRequest

name: Leave request refused
subject: Leave request rejection
content:
Hello $LeaveRequest.user.name$,


unfortunately, Your leave request for the period from $LeaveRequest.fromDate; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ to $LeaveRequest.toDate; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ can not be accepted.

Please log in to consult it.

In staying at your disposal to discuss it,


Best regards


$LeaveRequest.refusedBy.name$
metaModel.name: LeaveRequest

name: Leave request validated
subject: Leave request validation
content:
Hello $LeaveRequest.user.name$,


Your leave request for the period from $LeaveRequest.fromDate; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ to $LeaveRequest.toDate; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ has been validated.

Please log in to consult it.


Best regards


$LeaveRequest.validatedBy.name$
metaModel.name: LeaveRequest
